Posts.Content: Wow - it never occurred to me that Aromasin might be the reason for my painful achilles and heels.  Taking Jazzercise class was the last straw. Thought I had and sought treatment for plantar fasciitis. I took arimidex for two years.  Then last April was changed to Aromasin.  Tamoxifen is kind of scary. Marianne
Posts.Title: Does Anyone Get Painful Ankles and Feel While on Aromasin?
